Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: RMartin Choate
text: Always a great experience! Brandi is a wonderful stylist! I love The Masters!  The entire team is very kind and it makes for a very relaxing time in this very busy world.

resp.text: Hey there Martin! Brandi along with the entire team at The Masters Hair Salon is so very thankful for your kind words. Experience and the way you are made to feel is everything and we are glad that we achieved the goal of delivering exceptional service to you. See you soon.

name: Laura Webb
text: I studied at The Masters School of Cosmetology in the mid- late 90’s. My diploma was ruined. Might it be possible to receive another? I learned so much and trained with, in my opinion, the best. Pivot point has never let me down! Sincerely miss all my friends and instructors. Glad to see the Salon is still going! ❤️

resp.text: Hello Laura, The Masters School Of Cosmetology became a part of Virginia College around 2000. We are sad to hear about your diploma, and we will absolutely see what we can do to get you another one. We would love to have you come by and visit with us and our new location next to Whole Foods at the intersection of the Parkway and Bob Wallace. Next year we will celebrate our 45th year in business. Thank you for reaching out to us and we hope to see you soon!

name: Nikki Dudley
text: I love being a client at The Masters and have been for about 4 years now.  My stylist does an amazing job coloring my hair.  It is always exactly what I ask for but she already knows exactly what I want majority of the time without me having to tell her because we have acquired such a close relationship by being a client of hers.  The staff is all very friendly.  They work with you to find the right products that suit your hair best. I recommend them to anyone ! ! !

resp.text: Dear Nikki, the team at The Masters Salon is so very blessed to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. We place a high priority on providing every guest the very best we have to offer. Your kind words will serve to fuel our desire to focus on always being our best and to never settle for less than what each guest expects from us. 2015 will be a year of upping our game even more with higher levels of education, customer education events and expansion. We sincerely appreciate letting us know that you love us! The team at The Masters Salon!

name: Buff Gibbons
text: I am known for being frank and honest.  I have been going to see Beth at The Masters for several years because she knows exactly what to do to keep my hair looking great!

resp.text: Hello Buff, your direct communication helps to keep us focused and honest with who we are and how we take care of guests. Thank you, it is so appreciated and so are you! Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Georgia Pinson
text:
First thing I would like to say is I love my hair!  I have been a customer  for five years.

The entire staff welcomes you and is very helpful.  I have always had great service.

I  recommend the Masters when asked where I have my hair colored and styled.

resp.text:
Dear Georgia,
Your kind words and compliments are the exact reason we continue to do what we do. Making you and all of the guests that visit with us happy is all the evidence we need to know that we have kept our commitment to provide our very best, each and every time. The team at The Masters Salon places a high value on your time and your satisfaction. We sincerely thank you and we we look forward to your next visit with us.

name: Red Hathcock
text: My wife and I have been customers of the Masters for approx. 10 years and love it.  The employees and owner are tremendous.  They go out of their way to assist you in any manner possible and we can be sure that their service is consistently outstanding!  Great people and great atmosphere, always!  Merry Christmas to them!

resp.text: Your awesome and beautifully kind words fill our team with pride and joy. We love sharing this type of response with the entire team. Knowing that we were able to "completely" satisfy your needs is the fuel that feeds our desire to continue our efforts. It is our goal to have each and every guest receive the exact level of service experience. Thank you, sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Cathy Kearney
text: I am always very pleased with the services and products I receive from The Masters. My stylist/colorist, Rita, is awesome. She listens to what I say concerning all things, whether it's about what I want to do with my hair to how I'm feeling that day. I feel respected when I'm there.  Aveda products have really been the best for me, been using them for years. I highly recommend this salon for its staff, services, and products. New location is bright and clean, very trendy.

resp.text:
Dear Cathy,
I, along with the entire team at The Masters Salon find your kind words a blessing. Our goal at The Masters is to deliver on our promise to provide the very best of of us, each and every time. The fact that you felt respected during your time with us tells us that we are on the right path. We are honored that you took the time to compliment our new location and team. In addition, we love that you enjoy the Aveda products and services that we have to offer. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Buff Gibbons
text: I am known for being frank and honest.  I have been going to see Beth at The Masters for several years because she knows exactly what to do to keep my hair looking great!

resp.text: Hello Buff, your direct communication helps to keep us focused and honest with who we are and how we take care of guests. Thank you, it is so appreciated and so are you! Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Dana Edwards
text: Very satisfied! My daughter wanted a pink and purple ombre for homecoming and it looks 1000 times better than I ever imagined! Reasonable price and wonderful people! I'll be visiting again soon to get my own ombre! Her hair isn't even fried after all the correcting bleach she needed from months of box dye abuse.

resp.text: Hello Dana, it was a a lot of fun for the team to work with your daughter's hair! Pink and Purple are two of our favorite colors in the spectrum and getting to create such a fun look for such a wonderful moment in time for you and your daughter thrills us! This is what makes our day at The Masters Salon! Thank you.

name: Wilda Davis
text: I've been going to The Masters for about 30 years and have been pleased with my hair color treatments as well as the styles/stylists over the years.   Since there's a "new sheriff in town" (Brett) who's moved up to be a full-time manager, I was a bit skeptical about having anyone else color my hair.   However, I was pleasantly surprised with the stylist and now know that Brett is available to confer with the stylists as well as with customers regarding their hair treatments and "take home" products.   I would recommend The Masters to anyone who wants a professional experience in hair care.

resp.text: Dear Wilda, you have always been a big part of our customer family. Your years of support have been a strong reason of why we do what we do and you make it possible for us to continue! You are what makes us truly The Masters! We love your feedback, suggestions and praises and we sincerely appreciate the fact that you've taken the time to let us know that we are and have always been your favorite salon. Your friends, Brett and the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Brenda Matkin
text: Every time I go to The Masters for a cut and color I receive the great results that are customized just for my hair.  I always leave feeling that each new style is an improved and better look for my hair.  The stylist is a topnotch professional and the environment and facilities are very good.  I highly recommend The Masters.

resp.text:
Dear Brenda,
Our focus is on you, the guest. It is our pleasure to provide you the experience that you so deserve. Thank you for allowing us to be your professional salon. You are very important to us and we wish to see you soon. Sincerely, The Masters Salon

name: Grant
text: I'm honestly not sure where to start, but I wish I could give more than a 5 STAR REVIEW! As a client myself, family, and friends of mine also clients the experience is always beyond our expectations. Every chance I get I talk about my experience with this salon which usually results in them responding with "I'm already a client" or "I've heard they were fantastic" which concludes my review. See you guys soon!

resp.text: Dear Grant, It means a tremendous amount to the team at The Masters Salon that we were able to provide such a high level experience. We are only made stronger by your compliments and referral to your friends and family of our team and our company. Customers such as yourself are why we do what we do. It is the goal of the team at The Masters Salon that each and every guest receive our very best, every time. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon!

name: Monty Love
text:
I have been using The Masters for years.  It is a wonderful place with great talent and wonderful people.  They are always pleasant and listen to your needs and not there's.  They have the most talented stylist in Huntsville and are known and respected world wide.

Give them a try and you won't be disappointed!

resp.text: Monty, you make our day every time you come to see us. Although we gave to you wonderful services and atmosphere, it us that has been blessed by your patronage and presence. You are what makes The Masters Salon the company that it is today! Thank you, the team at The Masters Salon

name: Rickey Dodd
text: First, this is Rickey Dodd's wife, Debbie, writing this review.  I came to Huntsville from Birmingham, where I regularly visited a first class salon for many years.  I was nervous about trying a new salon in Huntsville, but my fears were quickly resolved by the staff at The Masters.  The salon is pleasant, the staff friendly, and Beth is awesome with both cut and color.  I'm thrilled that I found such a wonderful salon!

resp.text: Hello Debbie, or (aka, Rickey Dodd's wife), The team at The Masters Salon is thrilled to hear that we delivered on our promise to provide the very best we have to offer to each and every guest. Your generous 5 star rating and wonderful review encourages us to continue our focus. We are very thankful for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, the team from The Masters Salon.

name: Abigail Brown
text: I went to Beth for a year. She's phenomenal with color. When I came in and asked for something different the manager and son of the owner stepped in and decided to do the formulation and process himself. This man is considered to be extremely good with color. My hair came out neon orange when I asked for dark brown. He then tried to fix it the same day and it was still very very wrong. At this point I had been at the salon for seven hours. He then asked me to come back that Saturday for an "adjustment". I came out of that no better and my hair was damaged and breaking off. They also still charged me $450. I have never gone back. I also witnessed failure of management on managing clients and appointments. Brett has set up the salon where clients are passed around to whoever is free to work on them. So what you can expect is someone else possibly starting your appointment and another stylist finishing at. I experienced it myself and with other clients and it not only frustrated the clients but their stylists and employees themselves. I won't be going back but I will recommend Beth and Rica.

resp.text:
Dear Abigail,
You brought this to our attention in 2013 and I am grateful that you did. We are truly sorry that we failed to provide you with the experience that you deserved.

It is the absolute policy of The Masters to make sure that each guest has the opportunity to receive the very best and we sincerely apologize that we fell short of that expectation. It is also our wish to take care of any challenge that may occur as quickly as possible.
Because we are fortunate to have an amazing team, they all will quickly join in to help correct and balance any situation that may arise.

Again, we are sorry and we sincerely wish that we could have made this right for you. We appreciate your feedback and the insight that it has given us to continue to create a better atmosphere for our guests.

Sincerely,
The Team at The Masters

name: Amelia O'Neil
text: Shelby is a phenomenal stylist and Amanda is an amazing hair color specialist. Both always make sure that my entire trip to the Masters is a pleasure by going above and beyond with their helpful ideas and thoughtful extras.

resp.text:
Amelia,
Thank you so much for that feedback! Our goal as a team is to provide service and styling knowledge that help make your experience in the salon exceptional as well as making taking care of your hair at home easy! We are so very glad to hear that that dedication shows!

name: Roger Cloud
text: Amber at the front desk made me feel like I was at one of the classiest hair Solon's in the world. Beth the stylist was first class, meaning excellently skilled and made me look fabulous. I had given up on finding a first class hair Solon in Huntsville but the Masters is on par with Paris and New York........

resp.text: Hello Roger, on behalf of the entire team at The Masters Salon, we sincerely appreciate you kind words. We are thrilled that we delivered on our promise to deliver the very best of what we have to offer. It is always our goal that each and every customer receive our very best, and that above all else, they feel like we truly care about them and their wishes. We look forward to your next visit. Again, thank you. Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: cristi little
text: I have been a client at the Master's for over 25 years! I am a dedicated client and will never leave this professional, polished yet innovative and friendly team. Over the years, I lived away in Atlanta and Birmingham, but always came home to Huntsville for my hair care, color and style appointments. Love y'all! Cristi Little

resp.text:
Hello Cristi,
Thank you so very much for the kind words. Your dedication to us has helped make us the company we are today. It is our goal for each and every guest to receive the best of what we have to offer. Knowing that we were able to live up to that expectation for you encourages us to strive even harder and to deliver on all of our promises. You have been a big part of us, and we absolutely appreciate that. Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Matthew Anderson
text: My girls love this place... it's the people that makes it tol quality

resp.text:
Hi Matthew!

We are so glad to hear that your family has had a good experience with us! We are fortunate to have kind, talented individuals on our team and we are happy to hear that that shines through.

We certainly feel that with four stars we have room to improve - please feel free to share your thoughts on what we could do to make your girls' experience even better! Our email is masters_cares@bellsouth.net and we would genuinely appreciate your feedback.

Best wishes and Happy Holidays!

Beth
Guest Services Assistant

name: Aimee Mcdermott
text: This place is nice,  I think the stylist I had was maybe listing to someone else when I told her what I wanted! It’s really pricey if I would of liked my cut and style I probably wouldn’t of cared about the price!

resp.text: Dear Aimee, we appreciate the kind words and the team prides itself on the way the salon looks, but what is more important is the way in which we made you feel and what level of service we provided. It seems that we did not achieve our goal and that we delivered less than what was promised. A member of our guest care team would love to speak with you.  Please call us at your earliest convenience. Again, thank you for your honest and kind feedback. Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Katie Pearl
text: I've been using the services of The Masters for several years. The entire staff is very professional and they offer every option available to satisfy my needs.  I'm always very pleased with my color and cut, and I consider them all a family of friends.  I would recommend The Masters to anyone.

resp.text:
Dear Katie,
Thank you for being such an important part of The Masters Salon family. Your kind words are what motivates the team to always be their best. It is the goal of The Masters Salon to provide each and every guest with the experience that they have come to expect from us. We look forward to your next. Thank you, sincerely the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Alexzandria Turner
text: I had a pretty mediocre experience at this salon the staff was so professional and so nice. At first I really thought I was at the best salon in Huntsville but I asked for specific different kinds of colors in my hair even showed pictures and after I was finished my hair was all one color there is no dimension at all also prior to my visit I asked for someone who knows about curls to style my hair because I have naturally curly hair I was given the impression this would be no problem but what I found is what I've experienced at so many salons before the stylist looked at curls as if they were all the same and used products that were too heavy for my hair and left my hair feeling gross and stiff the style was absolutely awful I found myself not wanting to even look the staff in the eyes and holding my head down walking out the door because I was so embarrassed by the way my hair looked. My job pays me to look good and I couldn't even walk into my work place feeling confident (which is one of my favorite things about getting my hair professionally done the "confidence boost" you have after)  I research beauty and hair consistently I guess because of this I felt like I knew more about what needed to be done to my hair than the staff which I should not be able to say because they have had actual schooling in this. I could have done what they did myself and it probably would have looked better not to mention this all costed over $200 my usual stylist has been fully booked for some time now so I thought I would try someone new not only is the outcome with her phenomenal and EXACTLY what I ask for every time but she also costs half the price.

resp.text:
Dear Alexzandria,
The Masters places a very high emphasis on each and every guest receiving the very best of what we have to offer. We are very sorry that we did not live up to the expectations that we set. It is our goal and wish that no guest leave our salon without the feeling that we provided the very best experience. We have tried to contact you, but all of the contact information you left is invalid, and we are unable to reach or find you. It is important to us that we speak to you. Your feedback helps us to be better as a team and as a company. The team worries that it was something that failed with the color, cut or style when after you left us. We could tell you were very happy when you were checking out, so please, reach out to us so that we can address the challenges you are now having or had after you left.
Thank you. Sincerely the team at The Masters

name: Debbie
text: I love Beth and The Masters!  I'd been putting off finding a new salon after moving here from Birmingham, but once I went in The Masters, I felt immediately at ease and in good hands.  I love my hair!

resp.text:
Hello Debbie,
We are so excited that you enjoyed your experience with us. It is our focused goal to make sure that each and every guest receive the very best we have to offer, each and every time. Your confidence in us helps us stay focused on that goal. We look forward to your next visit. Thank you. Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon

name: Patricia Brown
text: Outstanding service!   Shelby has been doing my hair for years. Talented Master!

resp.text: Dear Patricia, We are so thankful that we were able to provide the level of service that you have always expected from us. We are who we are because of amazing clients like you. You make us better! Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Meredith Jerome
text: They have a great team that works together very well and did a great job helping me. They will go above and beyond to achieve what you want.

name: Patricia Brown

It is the focus at The Masters Salon to have each and every guest receive our very best. We look forward to your next visit! Thank you! Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Kim Edmunds
text: The staff of The Masters do an excellent job of coloring and cutting but they also excellent "people" people.  Everyone with whom I have come in contact has been warm and friendly and concerned about offering the best service possible.

resp.text: Dear Kim, you always leave such a positive mark on our team and our company. You help to make us our best and we love that you notice that our focus is to treat each and every guest like they are a part of the family. It is our promise to deliver the very best of ourselves to each and every guest. Thank you so much, sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Kathy Halsell
text: Excellent establishment in every way - Professional, courteous, and friendly environment.  I am always pleased with the results I get.  Plus, they use and sell a fabulous line of products that work great.

resp.text:
Dear Kathy,
Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience with us. It is the goal at The Masters Salon to provide the very best experience to each and every guest. The feedback from guests are what helps us to maintain our focus, to continue to be our very best. Thank you, sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Abby Burke
text: As a new client, they did nothing to aide in getting me in to see a stylist for a simple haircut. I worked in this profession for over 12 years and have never seen such poor customer service. I called at the beginning of April to get an appointment and was told they had no openings until May 25th. 3 Days prior to my appointment, they called to tell me that my stylist was out on "medical leave" and could not cut my hair. I needed to re-schedule to ANOTHER DAY with another stylist. AFTER waiting over a month for a haircut. Thanks but no thanks.

resp.text:
Hello Abby,
We are very sorry that to hear of your negative experience. It is the goal of the team at The Masters Salon to insure that each and every guest is treated fairly and with respect. We are sorry that this was not the case for you and we wish to mak up for this shortcoming. We will contact you immediately concerning this issue. Again, please accept our apology, Sincerely, Brett and the entire team at The Masters Salon.

name: Gary Arnett
text: This review has popped up as coming from my husband Gary, but I can assure you that it is from me.  All employees at The Masters are professional, courteous and great at their jobs-I have never left dissatisfied since I started there-around 1995!!!

resp.text:
Deal Julie,
The team at The Masters is so very thankful for clients such as you. You have helped us become who we. Our emphasis is not only on delivering a superior service and product, but to deliver the most superior of kindnesses that we possibly can. Thank you for your dedication to us. You have made our day! Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Melissa Tyson
text:
The BEST salon in Huntsville, AL!

I've been a long-time customer of The Masters. Brett, Shelby and their team are fantastic!!

resp.text:
Melissa,

Your words truly warm our hearts! We are blessed! Sincerely, Brett, Shelby and the entire team at The Masters Salon.

text: The staff was wonderful and they did an excellent job on my hair for my wedding!

Thank you from the team at The Masters Salon.

text: Always a wonderful experience!  Professionals that listen to their clients and you always leave with what you asked for.

You are one of the family and we truly appreciate you and all you do for us. Sincerely, the team at The Masters Salon.

name: Ang SP
text: They ruined my hair by insisting their color clients sit under steamers.  Thankfully, I found another salon that knows what they are doing.

resp.text:
Angela,
I am very sorry that your experience was less than you had expected. It is our desire for each and every guest to receive our very best. The machines are a conditioning color machine that uses gentle heat with steam. We would love to make it up to you, and to provide you with a much better experience and to discover where our failure may have been. Please contact us as soon as possible. We are here for you and we will listen to your concerns. Thank you

name: Vlooved
text: I wasn’t very happy with my haircut

resp.text:
Hi, Just!

We are sorry to hear your cut experience didn't meet your expectations! Our goal at The Masters is to consistently provide you with excellent service at all levels, and we are serious about that commitment from start to finish - that being said, our team would love to hear from you about what we could have done differently and we would like to rectify this situation. Please feel free to give us a call at your earliest convenience and one of our Guest Service Coordinators will be more than happy to get feedback from you and to discuss how to best adapt your cut and style to better suit your needs. Our number is (256)883-6270 or feel free to reach out to us via email at masters_cares@bellsouth.net.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Beth
Guest Services Assistant

text: I love this place

name: David Davenport
text: Drove 30 minutes to get here because the site said open now. Got there at 9:45 a.m. and was closed but someone was inside so I called the number and he turned out the lights! Maybe he had an emergency? I don't know but I went a block down to Debra's barber shop and got a haircut.

name: Jennifer Andrasko
text: Nicole is my favorite here.

name: Sylvia Moates
text: Elizabeth is great

name: Rebecca Finley
text: Great Stylists and great atmosphere.

name: Jeff GACESA
text: Nicole is so sweet.

name: Jessica Stiver
text: Since brandy left this place has gone downhill

name: Ken Westbrook
text:
Very satisfied with cut.
I am new to the area and due to the pandemic, I have been doing my own cut. I decided it was time to treat myself. Glad I chose this establishment. Clean and No appt needed. They even take cards or cash app for payments. Will more definitely be using their services 8n the future.

name: Tamara Boyd
text: My one year old loves it and sit still the entire time. I would recommend it for anyone. Thanks Bruh

name: Jeremy Payne
text: Excellent shop. The barbers were courteous and professional. The shop was clean and each chair was cleaned between customers. The atmosphere was laid back and calm and the music playing seemed considerate of younger ears. I will bringing my business here from now on.

name: Helen King
text: BEST BARBER SHOP IN AUBURN/OPELIKA! The shop is very clean and well lit. All the barbers are super friendly and experienced. They take their time and give you exactly what you ask for! I’ve been getting my hair and eyebrows cut by Bro for over 8 years now and I wouldn’t trust anyone else to do it! Go check them out. It’s worth it!

name: antonio simmons
text: A great place to get a haircut.  It is a really friendly and down to earth place to visit

name: Kenneth Black
text: Real nice and clean comfortable environment. Good barbers

name: keita stephens
text: Jeff did a awesome job took his time and gave a quality cut will be back

name: Garry Hammontree
text: Jeff was great. Got my head shaved and also part of my beard. Will definitely go back.

name: Antavius Tolbert
text: Nice establishment great barber dude been cutting me up for 10 years great atmosphere

name: Valerie Vines
text: Very professional, gave my son the exact haircut that asked for and my son and I love the cut!!

name: Ms. Graham
text: I would highly recommend The Barbers' Lounge for a great barber experience. The atmosphere was inviting and clean. Ryan was very detailed, attentive, and timely. He took his time and executed the perfect hair cut for my 13 year old son at a reasonable price. I just moved from Dayton, Ohio to Auburn a couple weeks ago and I'm happy that I found a great barber for my son.

name: La'Nise
text: All the barbers and stylist are amazing. They do our whole family's hair. My husband and boys get their haircut. And I got my hair done here as well. Mika one of the stylist also braids my 2 years old hair. He does so well with her, better than he does with me when I wash his hair. The Barbers are great with my oldest son hairline. Its tricky but they always do a great job.

name: Kenneth Rogers
text: Did a walk-in without an appointment. No wait and man, did Ryan do my hair right. Great service. Found my new barber.

name: Tommy Waldrop
text: I did not go there.

name: Brian Austin
text: Ok this shop advertised walk in and I walk in, don’t get greeted and 3 to 4 ppl after me they call to get a cut like nobody didn’t even ask is somebody helping you or nothing

name: Tam-Beret Selections
text:
Great atmosphere. Professional barbers with professional clientele.
Quick service but very skilled cuts. I really like the fact of setting specific appointments with the barber of your choice. Best new shop!

name: Charlie Bucks
text: Hands down this is the best shop in town! If your looking for quick, clean shop , respectful barbers, great vibe this is a one stop shop! Not including the braider who is the bomb. My family of three been rocking with Ryan for 4years now and he is awesome! Including the other good barbers . I highly recommend this lounge to anyone and everyone. My family loves them and you would too!!

name: RaChard White
text: This Is The Best Barbershop In Town!! They always provide the highest level of customer service and maintain a professional environment. I’ve never left with a bad haircut and people always take notice. This isn’t just a Barber Shop, it’s An Experience!!

name: Gage Long
text:
White guy with blonde hair. Walked in on a Saturday around 1:30pm and didn’t have to wait long at all. Only two barbers working. Denzii gave me a great fade and lined up my beard for $25. It was an overall great experience! Thanks for the great cut!

*Update(second visit)*
I called to ask if there was availability for a walk in and I was told to come on in! I arrived within 25 min and sat down because someone was already in the chair. Then another person got in the chair. I thought surely they must had just walked in before me. 45 min go by and I think I’m next. Another person walked in, I don’t know if they had an appointment or not. He sat down in the chair after I was there for an hour. Nobody said a single word to me the whole time I was there. I got up and left. Still not a word. If you don’t want to be treated like your business isn’t wanted, don’t go here. I called sports clips and got my fade. Samantha gave me a great cut there.

name: Alyson Trimble
text: Super nice staff.

name: Justin Davis
text: Where should I start? I've been in the area for some time now and I've became a creature of habit when it comes to normal day to day things. One day I went to spectrum to pay my internet bill and I saw this barbershop off in the corner by the name of the barbers lounge. So I decided to stop by to see what it was like on the inside but not to get a hair cut because at the time I had a barber. But upon entry I was greeted like family even though no one knew who I was. I was asked did I need a cut and I answered with a quick nope I'm good but a guy off in the back by the name of Ryan asked me again and said our cuts aren't the same as the cuts you're use to. So I took him up on his haircut offer and to my surprise this guy was a beast. I can say I've never had an experience like the one the lounge gave me with the post and precut techniques the guys do there. I'll recommend them to anyone. Love the place and the barbers there. Definitely a place to check out if you're down on the plains.

name: david rosier
text: "Bruh" is by far the best barber in the Auburn opeilka area  always been a 5 star barber!!!

name: Hoyt Hammond
text: The Best Barber Shop in Auburn/Opelika area. They are always professional and timely. Great quality haircuts.

name: Daniell Lyfe
text: From what my son told me Denzel went above and beyond and used techniques that other barbers rarely use. Well worth the money.

name: angelica Reynolds
text: Very comfortable setting, all the barbers are super friendly, very professional and take pride in their work 🙌🏽💯

name: Winfred White Jr.
text: World's best Barbershop!!!

name: Shirez
text: Professional service and they offer a variety of hair care services. Appointments are easy to book on the Booksy app.

name: Sherita Gullatte
text: The Barbers' Lounge is the BEST BARBERSHOP in Auburn, AL. A Friendly and Comfortable atmosphere. A great place to get your hair cut, or get your hair braided!!!

name: Winfred White Jr.
text: World's best Barbershop!!!

name: Tearia
text: The barbers there are absolutely amazing. It’s very clean there, the babers & stylist are very respectful, and it’s kid friendly. I watch each barber show off their skills every time my son goes to get a haircut. From the barbers, to the stylist. If you are looking for a fresh clean cut or nice style & braids. I HIGHLY recommend the babers lounge. I promise, you will not be disappointed. #satifiedcustomer

name: Tre Tooles
text: Best barbershop in Auburn!!! If you want a clean cut then look no further than the Barbers Lounge.

name: Robin Cobb
text: Great customer service, highly-qualified barber’s and beautician, clean facility, and comfortable environment. Definitely will be returning for more services!

text: Ryan is so fire with the clippers. Im in and out. No talking, no breaks, straight to business. I drive back to auburn for him to cut. Very professional

text: Great Customer Service and Satisfaction

name: Walter Thomas

name: josh bell
text: Love it

name: Desminique Rowell
text: Great Barbers!!!

name: Jack Clements
text: I’ve never felt the need to write a review on google for any business before but man Drake was awesome. Guy was super professional and even goes the extra mile with the hot neck shave and warm towel afterwards. Also every time I get a haircut I usually have to restyle it afterwards to my liking but Drake took note of how it was styled when I walked in and matched it to a t without even having to ask. Best haircut I’ve received anywhere!

name: Melissa Ann Milano
text: I may be a woman, but in a woman with the goal of something only a talented barber could do. And what a great job he did. Thank you, Trey! See you in a couple months. 😁

name: Kerry Griffith
text: I received a quality haircut each time I've gone to this place. Everyone I've met in Tuscaloosa seems to say good things about this place!

name: Demolition City
text: Was my first time here and I’m very satisfied. Russel did a great job and I will definitely be coming back.

name: Cooper Brown
text:
It’s really difficult for me to overstate how great of a job Grant did today.

This was my first time at Greasy Hands and my expectations were exceeded. Grant delivered the exact haircut I asked for and even made a suggestion when I was confused about how he should cut the back. Thanks Grant, I’m super grateful for the cut and your skill.

name: William
text:
If you’re anything like me, you struggle to convey exactly what you’re looking for in a haircut. Russel is the first barber I’ve had who listens to my childlike explanation of what I need in a haircut and makes it a reality.

All of these guys are well worth a 20-25% tip. Tip your barbers, folks.

name: Brad Borman
text: Fantastic place with fantastic barbers. Very cozy and has a great coffee shop next door. When you visit be sure to say hello to Molly, resident dog!

name: Jon Nguyen
text:
I’ve been getting my haircut from Russell and I drive from Starkville everytime I do. His work is nothing short of superb. If you’re looking for a clean, precise fade, he’s the guy. He also goes above and beyond to make sure everything is good to go before you leave. If you show him a picture and tell him what you want, he effectively communicates with you.

This is something I find that most other barbers in the area lack so driving an hour and half for a haircut is no problem for me for what Russell offers.

name: Paytron (Pate) Ward
text: I’ve been going here for two years and absolutely love it!! The staff is super friendly and the haircuts are phenomenal. I could not recommend this place enough if you are looking for a great cut in Tuscaloosa!!

name: Christopher Helm
text: Great service and atmosphere.

name: Aaron Jones
text: They did a awesome job. Made sure I was happy with everything.

name: Igor Fedin
text: Thank you for the fine detail, Drake. You are a talented barber.

name: Russell Copeland
text: If you are looking for a legit barbershop this is it! Great skilled guys who are the best around, old school professionals made modern. Look for Trey, he is a master at what he does.

name: Josh McCracken
text: Love this place. If you care about a good shave, beard trim and haircut this is the place to go in Tuscaloosa.

name: Brandon Vaughan
text: The way a Barber shop used to be. I’ve been there several times now and have never had a bad experience. The environment is great and the barbers are very friendly and professional. They also do detailed beard cuts and straight blade shaves with hot towels, which is hard to find these days. Top notch

name: Mat C.
text: Trey always does an awesome job. Can't recommend highly enough.

name: Daniel Conville
text: Great, high quality cuts that are consistent every time.  The atmosphere is laid back and the guys working in the shop are great and make easy conversation.  Exactly what someone wants from a barbershop.

name: thatcannonguy
text: Billy took great care of me. This will definitely be where I get my hair cut in T-Town from now on.

name: Jeremy Martin
text: Long wait for an appointment and its expensive, but its worth it

name: Melody Kernan
text: The best experience! Trey is incredible at what he does and gave me exactly what I wanted and I left feeling super confident as a result. If you're a woman with short hair, this is your spot! As a bonus they have the sweetest dog in their shop - the best door greeter in my book! See you guys again soon.

name: Tyler Elsberry
text: Great job and in a timely manner! Billy was incredible!

name: David Nutter (Dv8 Nutt)
text: Both Billy and Grant are amazing barbers, this place is packed with talent.  Going to really miss you Grant, such an awesome guy, thanks for all the amazing haircuts.

name: J Wang
text: Easy and clean. Very nice cut

name: Andrew Scarbrough
text: Great atmosphere, great experience, and a great haircut! Trey did an excellent job! The guys are extremely knowledgeable, timely and care about their customers.  You won't be disappointed. Turbo Coffee next door is a bonus as well.

name: Bill McIntyre
text: As usual, great experience! Trey is hands down the best Barber I have ever used. You not only get a great cut but the conversation is equally as enjoyable. If you're looking for a great place to get a haircut or beard trim, this is by far the best place in Tuscaloosa, AL.

name: Dalton Clary
text: Really good group of guys, and you’ll always get the look you want!

name: David James (djamestc)
text: Trey and all the guys do a fantastic job. Great place.

name: William McIntyre
text: Best place in town to get a haircut.

name: Christian Moore
text: The best barbershop I’ve ever had the privilege of visiting. If you’re looking for a nice, clean cut by a barber who knows what they’re doing and can make just about any haircut look perfect, this is your place. From the moment I stepped in the door I knew I was in for something special. This place truly is unique, top notch, and offers excellent service. Every barber across all Greasy Hands locations is better than any other barber I’ve ever visited. I left with the best haircut I’ve ever received and will most certainly be returning. Oh and they have a dog too so that makes it even better.

name: Jackson Carpenter
text: Hands down the best guys and best haircuts in Tuscaloosa. Modern-day barbershop with young guys who have skill beyond their years. Easy to book, a great cut, and a great experience all the way around. If you have 30 minutes and you need a cut, take your business to Greasy Hands and experience the 5-star rating for yourself.

name: Heath McLain
text: Excellent everytime! Truley awesome experience, far from just a trim!

name: Matt Daemond
text:
The shop is great and you can't beat the quality of haircut experience. If you tip like you should it'll run you about $40 but definitely worth it.

If you can spend that kind of money at least every few weeks on a haircut you'll get great service. You also won't have to play a guessing game on how well your cut is going to turn out.

Now there's also a coffee shop next door. If you think this place is any less than a 5 star service, the experience would be wasted on you anyway.

name: Duke Walsh
text: Difficult to get an appointment.  They dont except walk ins.

name: Sam Stevenson
text: Greasy Hands is THE barber shoppe for any man who does not want to settle for what you get at the "five 'n dime"  clip joints that offer sports TV.  My favorite barber is Billy.  That said, the other two barbers have their own following as well and I understand got their barber training in England. You will need to make an appointment as these gents stay busy. You can't go wrong with these guys. I live 1.5 hrs away and it's worth the drive.

name: James Walker
text: Great spot for a clean, modern haircut.

name: Austin Widner
text: After many months of searching and a few mediocre haircuts later, I finally heard about Greasy Hands. I figured I would give them a shot and they have exceeded all expectations. Getting a haircut, shave or trim here is worth every penny! Make sure to ask for Trey! Super knowledgeable and nice!

name: John Connor Dykes
text: Great place. It’s appointment only so you know you can get in and out reliably. The location is nice and the place is clean and smells good. The service was great and offered me very helpful advice about my haircut. They did a great job and I would absolutely recommend this as your go-to barber.

name: Ian Thomas
text: There is absolutely no one better! The only way I have been able to stay cool in this harsh Alabama heat is because Russel’s hands are so ❄️ICY❄️ with the clippers! 💯

name: Adam Beams
text: Billy is the best barber I have ever found.

name: Connor Tabarrok
text: A little pricey for a cut that was a little short. Cut 4/5 overall, it'll grow out to look nice, just expected more at the 30-40$ price range

name: George Phillips
text: They are awesome at their job

name: John Galbraith
text: There is absolutely no one better! The only way I’ve been able to stay warm through this harsh Alabama winter is because of  Russell’s FIRE fades and superb scissor work. 🤘🏼🔥😎

name: Dark Mandalorian
text: Greasy hands is a cool place and the guys that work there are professionals.

name: Michael Wartski
text: True professionals. They really care about their craft and listen to your needs. They can cut any type of hair and do a really great job cutting hair for military regulations. The second I walked out the door I knew this was going to be my go to place.

name: chad fendley
text: Great haircuts even better guys

name: Reid Jackson
text: Excellent job!, I don't know about $30 dollars excellent, feel like I could have gotten the same cut somewhere else for $20 this is a smaller town not Atlanta, I was hoping they would have thrown in a shave for free as well, don't go here if you want to get ripped off.

name: Clay Mathews
text: Guys... If you care about your hair at all, get your hair cut here. Incredibly friendly and knowledgeable stylists that will give you the best cut in town. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

resp.text: Thanks Clay!

name: Todd West
text:
Convenient, Not!
You would think that if you show up just two hours after they open to find no customers and two barbers sitting down doing nothing they would be happy to earn an extra $30 for ten minutes work. Not these guys. The first available appointment was 2 hours and 15 minutes from now. Went somewhere else and was on my way with a new haircut 20 minutes later, including the drive time. Saved myself $10 as well. Thanks but no thanks.

name: Mark Sherer
text: Best haircut for men, kinda of expensive,  30 for a haircut plus tip but they are absolutely awesome, every hair stylist does a great job

name: Jimmy K
text: Awesome barbershop with extremely professional service! Very clean and neat shop with an amazing atmosphere! I highly recommend this barbershop. Trey was my barber.

name: John McW

name: Cole Fendley
text: Best haircuts in ttown, top of the line guys with great hair cuting ability. I would refer anyone I know to check these guys out! The environment is second to none with a great location and sweet shop. By far the best barber shop In Tuscaloosa.

name: Travis McIntosh
text: I was taken excellent care of, I have long hair and an really touchy about getting it cut. These guys listened and gave me exactly what I asked for. They paid close attention to detail with the beard trim and didn't rush anything. 10/10 will be back again.

name: Mark Tobin

Have to get it fixed today by my wife's stylist. Will probably take me 6 months to get my hair back to where it was.

resp.text:
Gerald -
We're sorry to hear this - thank you for letting us know. Can you please provide more details via the Customer Care form on our website so that someone from our local salon management team can follow up with you? https://bit.ly/2YBQ2Jp
Thank you!

Terribly disappointed by the hair cut and the RIDICULOUS amount of time it took.

text: Love Shell. She is the owner. She cut my hair better than I had expected it to be cut. It looks absolutely beautiful.

name: Robert Sheffield
text:
I got referred here to see Atty by someone whose hair I thought looked beautiful.
She is amazing! She just gets color better than pretty much all the hairstylists I've seen, and does lovely cuts. She is mature and has a chill personality while being fun to talk to.

name: Robert Paul
text: Ask for Mane Stop Hair Salon. He cuts, colors and does amazing blow outs!!! I've referred many clients that were happy with the services as well!Mane Stop Hair Salon.

name: Angie Anderson
text: Taylor is the BEST!

name: Jane Gundry
text: I picked this salon from the reviews and was not disappointed. I was a snowbird for several weeks and needed a haircut. Shell gave me a wonderful haircut exactly like I wanted. I showed her a picture from my last cut at home and she knew exactly what to do. Very friendly and she knows how to cut hair. I would go back again.

name: karen Rugotska
text: Shell Mitchell is AMAZING! My husband and I are from Wisconsin and after being in Gulf Shores since mid-December we were badly in need of haircuts! We didn’t know where to go, but couldn’t wait until we’d return home. Today we were having our fur babies groomed at Sandy Paws (in the same strip mall). I saw the sign that Mane Stop Hair Salon welcomed Walk Ins. So. . . I checked on the Google reviews and decided this must be some kind of a Godsend! While the puppies got groomed, we went to Mane Stop Hair Salon. Shell was so skilled in her profession. We’re both so satisfied with our haircuts. Next year when we return for the winter, we will definitely return to Shell for our haircare needs.

name: Cathy Crosty
text:
I wanted to share my incredible experience at The Mane Stop
Salon in Orange Beach.
The salon was highly recommended by a local lady.
I have never been to a salon where customer satisfaction is such a priority.
My cut and high and lowlights color was so great that I didn't recognize
my own hair!
Thank you Shell Mitchell and Taylor you performed some amazing transformations as well.
See you all next year.

name: Hazel Tillman
text: Taylor is the best hairstylist i have found. She listens to your needs and explains what she is doing and suggestes what she feels is best. I just love her.

text: Mane style is great! Accommodating for our toddlers and did an excellent job at a great rate. Definitely will come back!

text: Just left this place. Ive never even considered myself remotely attractive until chuck cut my hair and my beard. Without a doubt best haircut I've ever had. I didn't know there was something behind this ugly mug.

name: Ethan Colbert
text: Very friendly, and a nice atmosphere. This man will get you in and out in a quarter of the time my old barber would, under 15 minutes at the most. For all his speed, he doesn't sacrifice any quality. He'll give a cut as good as anyone else in fairhope. 10/10 cant recommend enough

name: Alan Bell
text: BEARD TRIM - Chuck is the first barber that I have found that actually listens to what I want and then delivers. I actually "jacked up" my beard a few weeks back and Chuck was able to make the error disappear. The atmosphere has a 20s to 40s vibe and is VERY clean! I can't recommend Chuck enough, great job!!!

name: John Rivenbark
text: Did not give me the haircut I asked for it was more suited for shearing sheep I should have realised there was a problem when I noted no scissors around, only shearing clippers Barber completely wet my hair down with water before cutting this is always a bad side

resp.text: Hi John, thanks for taking your time to review us. We offer all types of cutting techniques. Scissor cutting , scissor over comb , clipper over comb , razor sculpting. There is times when a customer has a hard time to explain what they are looking for or the stylist/barber not understanding. This is why we turn every client around and ask them, “ Is  this what you were looking for?”  Why didn’t you say anything then? Sounds to me that you weren’t happy before your hair cut ?? Because wetting hair shouldn’t of been a bad sign to you. Using a water bottle in a salon/barbershop is completely normal. Very similar to a shampoo and cut. A lot of men have old product in there hair, wear glasses, hats, or their hair is simply messed up from normal wear throughout the day. It would make since to wet it and make sure of no cow licks or nothing to prevent unevenness. We are very surprised to receive a 1 star and you never said anything to us. We would of never charged you and made sure to give our best to change the style or fix whatever we needed to. I wish you would of gave us that chance before leaving us a 1 star. I would love to hear from you. Would you please contact us and let us do whatever it takes to make things right?? We want your experience only to be a 5 star. Were you a walk-in?? We don’t see you in our appointments at all?? I would call you if we had you in our records. Please contact us ASAP and give us a chance to make things right.

name: Sean H
text: Took my son there to get his hair cut. They we super nice and did an amazing job. We really liked the atmosphere too.

name: Richard Ingle
text: Chuck is the barber and owner of this place and you will not meet a nicer guy!! Very professional and clean barbershop. The 40's style decor and the music is amazing! Coffee and drinks in the back lounge just makes it even better! If you are looking for an awesome barber who can not only cut hair, but make the experience of being there very welcoming, this is your place!!

resp.text: Hi John, this is so untraditional for us to hear. We have looked through our data base and have done everything to find you. Please call us direct at 251-517-7553. We would like to do everything we can to make things right. Our customers satisfaction is our #1 priority.

text: Got the worst haircut in my life,, nothing like what I had shown a picture of. I  personally think that Ester should change her career as she's not good at this. Cape was put on me backwards so my pants and shirt was full of hair when I left there,,also she had the chair turned backwards so I couldn't see in the mirror, I was so upset when I saw what she had left me with.. I wish there was a minus star, but you have to give stars in order to leave a review. Never again

text: I used to get my hair cut here and a few times I have liked the way I got it cut. The reason I only gave 3 stars is I haven't liked the way they've cut my hair the last two or three times I went so I switched to a new place. Everyone has their own hair dresser preference and mine just happens to bw a different place.

name: RamonaLynne Wehrly
text: Very close to a Mall entrance. Enter at the entrance next to JCPenneys and it's right there at the entrance.  Very reasonable prices. I took a picture that showed her how I wanted my hair cut and she did a great job.

name: Shaylyn Washington
text: Only been here a few times but I love it every time. It is a great friendly atmosphere, friendly service and always meets my haircut needs. Loved my stylist Brooke today with my new bob haircut with gold highlights!

name: Savannah McMillan
text: How do I even put into words how terrible this place was? I came as a walk-in because I needed a haircut very badly and everywhere else I went was booked. I walked in and the people were pleasent enough but they all seemed to not give a care. The girl who cut my hair was kind of rude. She never introduced herself(I had to find out by looking at her cosmetology license) and she made me feel uncomfortable and like she could care less that I was giving her business. She also never started a conversation with me and when I tried to start one with her she never answered me back. Yes, I understand they need to concentrate but, my previous hairdress who retired made an effort to make me feel good about myself while I was in her chair. She spent maybe 20 minutes on my hair and she didn't even style it with a flat iron or blow dryer. Mind you, she dry cut it, which to me is a no-no and she should have put in the effort and asked me my preference. I would have paid extra. I didn't realize until after I had gone to work that it was everything I told her I didn't want. Choppy haircut and and chunky layers. I'm so upset and if I could get my money back I would. Basically, I'm so ashamed that someone who is in the beauty business treated me this way. I will never go back there again.

name: Minnie Richardson
text: The employees are really friendly. Plus I got a great haircut 😁

name: Liz Blair
text: I was a walk in and got seated with Brooke. I showed her a few pictures for reference and thoroughly explained what I wanted. I'm a 23 year old woman and I wanted a pretty simple long bob cut with thinned out ends. She cut my hair 3 inches too short, didn't thin out my hair correctly, and gave me exactly what I said I DIDN'T want. It's a uniform bob cut that looks 20 years older than anything I would ask for. She frequently stopped my haircut to text and talk on her phone. I can't even give her a second chance to get it right because so much was already taken off. Never going back, especially not to her.
